mapper.select: SELECT id, avatar, username, password, name, birthday, address, telephone, email, depart_id AS departId, sex, type, status, remarks, tenant_id AS tenantId FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} LIMIT 1

SELECT id, avatar, username, password, name, birthday, address, telephone, email, depart_id AS departId, sex, type, status, remarks, tenant_id AS tenantId FROM sys_user WHERE telephone = #{mobile} LIMIT 1

SELECT a.code AS permission, a.type, a.title AS name, a.href AS uri, a.method, IFNULL(b.title, a.title) AS menu FROM sys_element a LEFT JOIN sys_menu b ON a.menu_id = b.id WHERE a.code != '' AND a.code != '/' UNION ALL SELECT c.code AS permission, 'view' AS type, c.title AS name, c.path AS uri, 'GET' AS method, d.title AS menu FROM sys_element c LEFT JOIN sys_menu d ON c.menu_id = d.id WHERE c.code != '' AND c.code != '/'

SELECT a.code AS permission, 'jump' AS type, a.title AS name, a.path AS uri, 'GET' AS method, IFNULL(b.title, a.title) AS menu FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu b ON a.parent_id = b.id WHERE a.type = 'menu'

SELECT DISTINCT c.code AS permission, c.type, c.title AS name, c.href AS uri, c.method, d.title AS menu FROM sys_role_user a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.role_id = b.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_element c ON b.menu_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_menu d ON c.menu_id = d.id WHERE c.code != '' AND c.code != '/' AND c.visible = '1' AND a.user_id = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT c.code AS permission, 'view' AS type, c.title AS name, c.href AS uri, 'GET' AS method, d.title AS menu FROM sys_role_user a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.role_id = b.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_element c ON b.menu_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_menu d ON c.menu_id = d.id WHERE c.code != '' AND c.code != '/' AND c.visible = '1' AND a.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT c.code AS permission, 'jump' AS type, c.title AS name, c.path AS uri, 'GET' AS method, IFNULL(d.title, c.title) AS menu FROM sys_role_user a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.role_id = b.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu c ON b.menu_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_menu d ON c.parent_id = d.id WHERE c.type = 'menu' AND a.user_id = #{userId}
